cause.description:
I decided to start this cause with Lindsay ______ (who wants to remain nameless and a loner and a complete tard) when I saw a cause to do with hip hop and someone saying it rocked. Cause it really doesn't. It sucks. A LOT. So I would like to join forces with everyone that still likes to rock out to various bands, such as: Led Zeppelin, AC/DC, The White Stripes, Jimi Hendrix, Black Sabbath, Pink Floyd, and/or any other kick ass musical formations.
That is all.
1. MTV sucks.
2. Hip-hop sucks.
3. Rap sucks.
4. Simple Plan and Nickelback sucks.
5. The Beat 94.5 sucks.
cause.mission: To spread awareness of pownsome music.
cause.name: ROCKERS UNITE!
